channel.title: Smart Home Circle
channel.description: Articles about everything related to smart home. Here we explore what are the various ways we can integrated smart devices to Home Assistant and much more.

item.title: How to Setup Zigbee2Mqtt with Home Assistant — Step By Step Guide
item.description: In this article, we will look at how you can set up a Zigbee2Mqtt with Home Assistant
item.author: smarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)

item.title: Connect Zigbee Plug Using Sonoff Zigbee 3.0 USB Dongle Plus To Home Assistant - Step By Step Guide
item.description: In this article, we will be looking at how we can connect Zigbee Devices using Sonoff Zigbee 3.0 USB Dongle Plus to Home Assistant.
item.author: smarthomecircle@gmail.com (Amrut Prabhu)
